replies.author: WW_GG
replies.txt_content: 标题: 权限组问题【高悬赏】我想要VIP权限继承builder，然后显示已经继承了，但是是VIP权限组并没有builder权限组的权限

replies.author: Crow__
replies.txt_content: 颠倒一下位置试试，你可能设置成了builder组继承VIP了

replies.author: WW_GG
replies.txt_content:
850639946 发表于 2016-6-29 11:45
低悬赏
把配置文件发上来
Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.chat.format
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.hat
    - -essentials.nick
    - automessage.receive
    - automessage.receive.公告
    - chestcommands.item.filename.yml
    - chestcommands.open.*.yml
    - chestcommands.open.config.yml
    - chestcommands.open.filename.yml
    - epicguild.create
    - marry.default
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.use.add
    - plotme.use.remove
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.changeprice
    - quickshop.create.create.double
    - quickshop.create.find
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  VIP1:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.hat
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&f白银'
      suffix: ''

WW_GG 发表于 2016-6-29 18:00
Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
=-=全部文件
